comments:
I get an internal error when trying to move a file to another package, using refactor->move

This seems to be stemming from a missing class file:
Caused by: java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: org/eclipse/jst/jsp/core/internal/java/search/JSPSearchSupport


I have (amongst all the others) installed the following files from the WTP project:
org.eclipse.jst.jsp.core (1.2.1.v200709181730) "Structured Source JSP Model" [Installed]
org.eclipse.jst.jsp.core (1.2.100.v200709252123) "Structured Source JSP Model" [Resolved]
org.eclipse.jst.jsp.ui (1.1.201.v200709061102) "SSE JSP Source Editor" [Installed]

Just realized the horrible textwrapping. backtrace i included in this file.
Something about your installation is invalid, that class has been present since before R0.7.  Did you somehow unpack a development build over a release or maintenance build?
